document_name_accent: ung thu vom hong giai doan 2.json
document_title: Stage 2 nasopharyngeal cancer: Symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Nasopharyngeal cancer is often diagnosed from stage 0 to stage IV, in which stage 2 nasopharyngeal cancer is considered the intermediate stage. However, this is still an early stage in nasopharyngeal cancer treatment, with a cure rate and 5-year survival rate of 70-80%. (first)
subsection_title: ung thu vom hong giai doan 2.json. What is stage 2 nasopharyngeal cancer?
subsection_data:
ung thu vom hong giai doan 2.json. What is stage 2 nasopharyngeal cancer?
Nasopharyngeal cancer is often diagnosed from stage 0 to stage IV, in which stage 2 nasopharyngeal cancer is considered the intermediate stage. However, this is still an early stage in nasopharyngeal cancer treatment, with a cure rate and 5-year survival rate of 70-80%. (first)
